name: American Wild Hunting
description:
American Wild Hunting is one of the most thrilling birds shooting game available on Store. If you love to shoot with the most well-known guns, rifles, hand guns and machine guns of the market, you will love playing this shooter.

You'll find in this hunting game the real birds you can shoot in real life hunting on North American territory from Albatrosses to Eagles, Swans to Ducks, Pigeons to Bufflehead and many more.

With its high-paced action, America Wild Hunt will challenge your dexterity and ability to concentrate.
Its main features are:

-Easy and Smooth Controls
-Beautiful Sceneries
-3D Animated Flying Birds
-Realistic Sound Effects
-HD Graphics
-True Birds Sounds

Are you ready to become a wild hunter? Then play for free Birds Hunt Safari and become the worldwide hiscore tenant!
